Title: Identify || Verify Tariff ID for CTNs with product ID CTR17c and agreement date before 11 August 2021
Area Path: VF UK IT - CX and DC\Sphinx

Step Action: Send a get request for identify API @URLPathOfService using a valid @ctn
Assert response code and tariff ID value in the received response
